Question
========

Given a sample with outcomes 27, 25, 28, 27, 29, 25, 19, 25, 29. The mode of this sample is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 25
* 26
* 27
* 29

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 25: Correct
* 26: Incorrect
* 27: Incorrect
* 29: Incorrect
